Text:
Here are Romanian subtitles:      http://subscene.com/romanian/Beginners/subtitle-510326.aspx

[subtitrarea in Romana]

The audio on this release is really messed up, the right channel is missing, and the center channel is mixed at high level into the left and rear channels.

The CHD release also has this problem.

@fin2:

So you say it's only 3.1 ?

How come no one has ..heard this big  issue till now ?

I've seen some rebuild versions 1080p ...with 5.0 !!
